text: Jacqui Hames is an English journalist, television presenter and former police officer. ==Career== Jacqui Hames was a presenter of the BBC programme Crimewatch from 1990 until 2007. In 2008, she published Savvy! with Fiona Bruce. In 2012, she gave evidence to the Leveson inquiry after she was a victim of the phone hacking scandal. Hames has since presented programmes on Sky News and the BBC and regularly appears on Good Morning Britain, This Morning and LBC. == References == ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:English women journalists Category:English television presenters Category:BBC television presenters Category:Women Metropolitan Police officers Category:21st-century British journalists Category:20th-century British journalists Category:Metropolitan Police officers
title: Jacqui Hames
